page.title: 18Worth Pond; Fund Raising.
page.content: The pond next to the school has just had a new lining put in it. This is how it was done and what happened. The thirty residents of Worth who started to rebuild the pond began in August 1984,because the water kept on draining away and there was no fauna left in the pond.The people who helped do the pond formed a committee and went from door to door collecting money from the villagers.The minimum cost was {2100 and they raised {700.Then they asked the Parish Council and they raised with the help of local factories {3000. All the water had to be drained out,but the pond kept on getting water in the bottom.This was caused by cracks in some of the villagers' water pipes.The surplus water ran through the drains and into the pond.(continued on next page).
